channel.title: Cahier de ma vie
channel.description: Recent content on Cahier de ma vie

item.title: Finally Deployed
item.description: When people said that it’s more difficult to find the correct information on the internet than to find the informations themseves, they weren’t kidding. It took me several hours to finally found the right tutorial slash guide to finally deploy this little Hugo blog as its own Github Pages. So, shoutout to the owner and writer of this page. And to anyone else looking to deploy Hugo on Github Pages, go read their guide––it’s so clear and, what’s better, it works.
